seo: HTTP请求头伪造,IP伪造,七层安全绕过,XFF请求头
seo_en: HTTP header forgery, IP forgery, layer 7 security bypass, XFF header
summary: 该插件通过设置多种HTTP请求头（如X-Forwarded-For等）伪造请求IP，以绕过七层安全设备的检测。
summary_en: This plugin forges the request IP by setting various HTTP headers (such as X-Forwarded-For) to bypass detection of layer 7 security devices.
